<h3 id="X38220">X(38220) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(13), X(14)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^5-(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(2*b^4-3*b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38220) = X(1)+2*X(115) = X(1)-4*X(11725) = 2*X(1)+X(13178) = 4*X(2)-X(9881) = X(2)+2*X(12258) = X(4)+2*X(11710) = 4*X(5)-X(9864) = 2*X(10)+X(7983) = 2*X(10)-5*X(14061) = X(13)+2*X(11706) = X(14)+2*X(11705) = X(40)-4*X(6036) = X(98)+2*X(946) = X(99)-4*X(1125) = X(99)+2*X(11599) = X(115)+2*X(11725) = 4*X(115)-X(13178) = X(7983)+5*X(14061) = X(9881)+8*X(12258) = 8*X(11725)+X(13178)</b>
<p>X(38220) lies on these lines: {1,115}, {2,9881}, {4,11710}, {5,9864}, {10,7983}, {13,11706}, {14,11705}, {30,38221}, {40,6036}, {98,946}, {99,1125}, {114,8227}, {148,3616}, {214,10769}, {230,5184}, {238,5127}, {405,22514}, {474,13173}, {515,14639}, {516,34473}, {517,38224}, {518,6034}, {519,9166}, {542,16475}, {543,25055}, {551,671}, {620,3624}, {952,38229}, {985,18393}, {1319,13182}, {1385,6321}, {1386,11646}, {1698,6722}, {1699,2794}, {1702,8980}, {1703,13967}, {1916,12263}, {2023,12782}, {2643,24957}, {2646,13183}, {2782,5886}, {2784,3817}, {2787,16173}, {2795,26725}, {2796,19883}, {3023,11376}, {3027,11375}, {3029,19858}, {3086,24472}, {3120,24617}, {3576,23698}, {3679,5461}, {4297,10723}, {4368,19935}, {5182,38049}, {5587,23514}, {5603,14651}, {5988,24161}, {6033,9955}, {6055,31162}, {6669,12780}, {6670,12781}, {7970,13464}, {7982,20398}, {7988,36519}, {8983,19109}, {9478,12783}, {9624,11724}, {9830,38023}, {9860,11522}, {9875,36523}, {10053,30384}, {10069,12047}, {10165,21166}, {10722,18483}, {10768,16174}, {11230,15561}, {11602,11739}, {11603,11740}, {11606,12264}, {11707,23004}, {11708,23005}, {11735,16278}, {12042,12699}, {12184,17605}, {12188,18493}, {12261,18332}, {13180,17614}, {13211,15359}, {13605,15342}, {13971,19108}, {14844,33147}, {14971,19875}, {18481,22515}, {23944,25687}, {26446,34127}, {31274,34595}, {38028,38222}</p>
<p>
X(38220) = midpoint of X(5603) and X(14651)<br>
X(38220) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5182, 38049), (5587, 23514), (15561, 11230), (19875, 14971), (21166, 10165), (26446, 34127)<br>
X(38220) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 115, 13178), (115, 11725, 1), (148, 3616, 11711), (1125, 11599, 99), (3624, 13174, 620), (7983, 14061, 10)<br>
</p>
